text:
Sentry | http://getsentry.com | Full-time in San Francisco

Come help us develop our open source exception monitoring service: http://github.com/getsentry/sentry.

Sentry is a small team (just 11 people) with a beloved product, a long list of notable customers, strong and growing revenue, and a commitment to open source.

We're particularly interested in hiring:

* An experienced JavaScript engineer â€“ our client front-end is written using React, Flux patterns, and assembled using Webpack

* Infrastructure/back-end engineers with a penchant for Python and scaling

You can find generic boiler text about our roles here: http://getsentry.com/jobs, or reach out to me directly to find out more: ben (at) getsentry.com.
